divs: sighting detailsi was doing some search on ufo videos on youtube and found something interesting. one footage was from actual fox news covering columbia shuttle disaster, feb 2003 and the other one is from someone in hong kong in 1995. if you notice the ufos in both the footages they look almost identical. the footage from fox news was taken from a professional news camera and the ufo is very very vivid in this footage. the footage from hong kong i assume was shot from a consumer vhs camera available at that time. if you notice the ufo shape, they look very similar, or in my opinion exactly the same. here are the videos i am talking about: hong kong 1995: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=g2e6ft1_y6y fox news 2003: http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=nhc5oihfufo the hong kong footage shows the object glowing while preserving its shape. fox news footage is very crisp and clear. watch them yourself and be the judge
Summary: Identical UFOs from different parts of the world and year
